remarks: Lemma for proving integer exponentiation closure laws.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jun-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2014.)
statement:
expcllem.1 $e |- F C_ CC $.
expcllem.2 $e |- ( ( x e. F /\ y e. F ) -> ( x x. y ) e. F ) $.
expcllem.3 $e |- 1 e. F $.
expcl2lem.4 $e |- ( ( x e. F /\ x =/= 0 ) -> ( 1 / x ) e. F ) $.
expcl2lem $p |- ( ( A e. F /\ A =/= 0 /\ B e. ZZ ) -> ( A ^ B ) e. F ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x $.
$d F x y $.
